messages.content: I have lived in Bournemouth all my life and know my area and its needs well. I work in higher education and prior to this worked for the NHS. Education, health and the family are key priorities for me. I am committed to the Labour values of equality, inclusivity and social justice and I have always worked hard to create a world based on these principles. And now we have a Labour manifesto that reflects this. With this election, we have the opportunity to stop the erosion of our hospitals, schools and family life by voting Labour. I will conscientiously represent each and every one of you in Parliament and seek your support at the ballot box. Thank you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Education is a key priority, with a focus on higher education and stopping the erosion of schools.
Stopping the erosion of hospitals is a key priority.
Family life is a key priority, with a focus on equality, inclusivity, and social justice.

issues.education: Education is a key priority, with a focus on higher education and stopping the erosion of schools.
issues.health: Stopping the erosion of hospitals is a key priority.
